As part of the diagnosis, your doctor will look for symptoms such as swelling, warmth, pain, and limitations in joint motion throughout your body. Your doctor may ask you questions about the intensity of your pain symptoms, how often they occur, and what makes the pain better or worse.",NIHSeniorHealth,Rheumatoid Arthritis
How to diagnose Rheumatoid Arthritis ?,"There is no single, definitive test for rheumatoid arthritis. Comm
